body.name: Lucid 8 Inch Twin XL Mattress - Firm Gel Memory Foam Mattress – Bamboo Charcoal Foam –Gel Infused- Hypoallergenic Foam Mattress, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 16 hrs 45 mins
features: GENERAL NOTE: Please allow 24 - 72 hours for your mattress to regain its full shape, any memory foam will expand faster in a warmer room; the expansion time of the mattress will vary as per the surrounding
FIRM FEEL: This Lucid mattress provides a firm feel ideal for stomach and back sleepers and is perfect for teens and growing children
MEMORY FOAM: A 1.5-inch layer of responsive memory foam provides soft comfort, and the 6.5 inches of bamboo charcoal base foam offers a sturdy support.Top:Polyester Blend
BAMBOO CHARCOAL: The bottom layer contains hypoallergenic properties with a bamboo charcoal foam to help maintain freshness and reduce odors
PLACE IN ANY ROOM: The mattress fits teens, dorm rooms, and apartments and works well with slatted bed frames and platform beds with no box spring required

MATTRESS IN A BOX: Good sleep can’t wait. This is why we’ve designed all our Lucid mattresses to be compressed, rolled, and shipped in one box for easy delivery and setup; simply unbox, unroll, and wait 24-72 hours for the mattress to expand
body.description: At Lucid, we make beds for the whole family—because when you wake up feeling your best, your family gets the best version of you too. The Lucid 8 Plush Gel Memory Foam Mattress is a great go-to bedroom choice for bunk beds, teens, dorm rooms, and apartments and for stomach and back sleepers. Made to perfectly fit, the Twin XL mattress will match with any Twin XL bed frame. A 1.5-inch layer of ventilated gel memory foam and a 6.5-inch layer of high-density support foam gives a plush feel. The gel memory foam layer helps regulate body temperature. Plus, the bamboo charcoal infusion helps keep your beds smelling fresh thanks to its natural hypoallergenic properties. Comfort awaits.

Shipped Compressed LUCID mattresses are compressed, rolled, and shipped in an easy-to-manage box for convenient shipping and simple setup. CertiPUR-US This product is CertiPUR-US safe with the highest performance and safety standards to ensure uncompromising comfort and protection for your family.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Surprisingly Comfortable Sleep Experience!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Lucid 8 Inch Queen Firm Memory Foam Mattress, and I couldn't be happier with my decision. This mattress has completely transformed my sleep experience for the better.First and foremost, the firmness level is just right. It provides the perfect amount of support for my back, ensuring a comfortable and restful night's sleep. I wake up feeling refreshed and without any aches or pains.The 8-inch thickness strikes a great balance between support and plushness. It's not too thin to feel the underlying structure, yet not too thick that it compromises the supportive feel of a firm mattress. The memory foam contours to my body, offering a personalized and cozy sleeping environment.One of the standout features for me is the breathability of the mattress. The memory foam is infused with cooling gel, which helps regulate temperature throughout the night. No more waking up in a sweat – this mattress keeps me cool and comfortable all night long.Setting up the mattress was a breeze. It arrived in a compact box, and once I opened it, it expanded to its full size within a few hours. The quality of materials used is evident, and I appreciate the attention to detail in the construction.As a bonus, the Lucid mattress comes with a soft and breathable cover that is easy to remove and clean. This adds an extra layer of convenience and ensures that my mattress stays fresh over time.In conclusion, if you're in the market for a firm memory foam mattress, the Lucid 8 Inch Queen is an excellent choice. It combines the perfect level of firmness, support, and comfort for a great night's sleep. I highly recommend this mattress to anyone looking to upgrade their sleep experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quite firm, but also comfy. A godsend for sciatica.
reviews.reviewText: good value, works great for a second bed for my wife to use when sciatica gets bad/single guests.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wasn’t firm enough.
reviews.reviewText: I like Lucid brand and had my last one for ten years, I loved it up until the ten year mark. Maybe my preferences have changed and I can’t handle plush mattresses anymore.Anyway, I do believe that at this price point it’s actually a good mattress. I read some of the reviews and I have to say, it deserves better reviews.It’s actually really good quality, if you have a very low budget. It amazes me that anyone would buy a mattress at this price and have anything to complain about. I feel that there should at least be gratitude for the fact that we can purchase any mattress at this low of a price point. If you want something better then keep saving until it can be afforded, otherwise maybe buy a used mattress off of FB marketplace.Anyway, my experience was -1. The mattress wasn’t nearly as firm as I expected. Again, that was my own thought and expectations. It just gave too much for me. Which I can say some might love that it cradles them! Maybe it gave so much because I’m pregnant and weigh an extra 40 lbs, which puts me at 190 lbs. So maybe just not great for a heavier body.2. I wish I had bought a ten or twelve inch instead. I think that would have helped.3. No smell at all and was very cleanly packed.Bottom line - if you’re a lighter person and you need a low profile mattress and you also like to sink a bit, this one might be perfect for you.We bought it because we were In between moving, getting a new mattress and waiting for our Satviaa to be delivered.It served its purpose for a few weeks but now my nephew has it. He’s about 6 feet tall and 140lbs & he LOVES it! He said it’s so comfortable.To each their own…I’m happy with the purchase and super fast delivery.Thanks Lucid, for providing affordable comfort and a great low cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have metastatic breast cancer in my ribs and spine. I am comfortably able to sleep more soundly and for longer with this mattress than with more expensive widely-marketed brands. Great value!!! Comfort without breaking the bank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the money
reviews.reviewText: Puffed right up once we opened it. Very comfortable. My son wanted “squishy” and this got two thumbs up from him. It’s not quiet squishy like a pillow top, but it is very comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I’m sleeping so well!
reviews.reviewText: I love this bed! I like a firm bed and this is firm. After traveling to Asia I’ve been looking for a firm thin bed similar to over there. This is as close as I could get. There were mixed reviews on quality, which was concerning. I have nothing but positive things to say. I feel like I’m being suspending in this bed. I’ve had the bed for about 4 months now and there is no change to the bed. I’ve been sleeping better for multiple reasons. It’s so comfortable and I can’t feel my husband move or get up early in the am.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this mattress because it was firm. I cannot sleep on a soft mattress due to back problems. This mattress is Very Firm. Too firm if you have Fibromyalgia like I do. But I love it. So I ordered a mattress topper to lessen the hardness on my body. Especially my shoulders when side sleeping because I had a bad fall years ago and injured my shoulder and back. But if you are looking for Firm then this is the mattress for you. No regrets and I highly recommend. It inflated fully in less than 2 days. There was Never any Smell at all. I'm happy I went with my gut instinct to try it out.Update: I purchased the mattress topper and it definitely took the edge off of my Fibromyalgia and Back pain.
Suuuuper cómodos, pedí 2 y todo excelente! Tarda en inflar como 1 hora pero 3 días para llegar a su consistencia más firme, vale mucho la pena
It took over 2 days for the mattress to fluff up. I am able to sleep well at night and relax during the day. No complaints.
Our last Lucid mattress was a plush and lasted over 10 years. But we wanted something firmer - I've been so happy with this mattress!
I was sceptical about it first cause it's way too cheap as compare to other memory foam, but am super amazed how firm it is, I am getting a really good nights sleep now!
